title: If anyone would like to know, Riot has just disabled ranked again
body: Something serious has just happened. I qued up for URF and the game did not leave champion select. I am trying to reconnect by restarting the game right now. It didn't work. Can we get an explanation on what have happened? If this "bug" makes it so that we can't play this weekend, will Urf be postponed or something?

replies.poster: x R e n g a R x
